db:abstract.db:para: Demonstrates using Qt Quick item as a texture with three.js.
This documentation was introduced in QtCanvas3D 1.1.

db:article.db:programlisting:
TEMPLATE = app
QT += qml quick
target.path = $$[QT_INSTALL_EXAMPLES]/canvas3d/threejs/$$TARGET INSTALLS += target
SOURCES += main.cpp
RESOURCES += cellphone.qrc
OTHER_FILES += qml/cellphone/* \ doc/src/* \ doc/images/*
